Nilamani Chandrika Haaram - Emerald & Diamond Beaded Necklace

₹133,614

Description

A timeless blend of classic and contemporary styles, this Haaram exudes regal elegance. The vibrant sapphire beads offer a striking contrast to the warm gold and shimmering CZs. The emerald symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making this piece not just beautiful but also auspicious. The superior craftsmanship ensures both enduring beauty and lasting value.

Materials

  • 22K Gold (916 Hallmark)
  • Natural Emerald (Oval Cut
  • VS Clarity)
  • Polished Sapphire Beads
  • Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Accents.

Features

A stunning fusion of tradition and modernity. This Haaram features three strands of lustrous, round sapphire beads interspersed with CZ-studded gold spacers. The central pendant showcases intricate floral filigree design, meticulously handcrafted in gold. An exceptional oval-cut emerald is the focal point, surrounded by a halo of sparkling CZs. Delicate CZ-studded drops enhance the pendant's graceful sway. The gold links are crafted with durable quality, reflecting the Hyderabadi craftsmenship.
